H0.text: From which fruit is Slivovitz made. Apricot

H1.text: From which fruit is Slivovitz made. Cherry

H2.text: From which fruit is Slivovitz made. Peach

H3.text: From which fruit is Slivovitz made. Plum

A4.text: Slivovitz is a fruit spirit (or fruit brandy) made from damson plums, often referred to as plum spirit (or plum brandy).

A5.text: The plum has always been an essential produce in this region.
